description:
Opens with scenes of the massacre at Carne by the Death Knight, and the battle between Aura, Mare, and the Fire Elemental in the Amphitheatre, while the OP song "Clattanoia" plays and a voice over gives the series synopsis.
Then there are some quick shots of Albedo leaning into Ainz, followed by Ainz floating in space overlooking the world.
Finally some scenes of the Guardians, and the list of channels and air times for the show. It ends with Ainz doing a voice over demanding you to surrender.

titles.title: PV 3 (0:30) Battles in Carne & Amphitheatre / Ainz floats over world
